Good afternoon! The cost of your product is too high for our company. But if you give a 25% discount, then we can become your customers.
Hello! We are ready to hire you if you work for us for free. In case you pay extra to us, we are ready to discuss the possibility of a weekend
Good morning! I want to quit the company. I do not like what I do and my colleagues.
Hello! Join our sect of Cthulhu witnesses. Transfer home, car to us. Then there is a chance that Cthulhu will take your life last.
Hi! You spend too much time at work. I can not go on. I rarely communicate with you even on weekends. We should break up.
Hello! Give me a bribe or I will inform you in tax. They will put things in order in your company.
Hello! Can you take me to work as an acquaintance? I have nowhere to go otherwise.
Good afternoon! We cannot take your application to the store. You have a poor design.
Hello! At first, we didn’t agree on your share in the business. Let's discuss it after the first working prototype, okay?
Hello! Let's rent an apartment together so that it is close to the university? Together will be cheaper.
Good afternoon! I can’t certify you until you have passed all the work.
Hi! Buy me a new phone.
Hello! Test our raw application and tell your opinion to developers. We do not have a tester in the team and we need your help.
Hi! Take me to work. I can program smart irons and sites for irons.
Good evening! I have the super ability to read thoughts spoken aloud. Take me to the company of heroes.
Hello! I hacked the site of your store. Pay the ransom in three bitcoins.
Hey! Tell a joke, I’m very sad. Maybe then I will tell a secret.
Robbers, walk out with your hands up! Otherwise, we will be forced to open fire.
